NSMutableArray *arguments = [NSMutableArray array]; \
do { \
id arg; \
va_list args; \
if (object) { \
[arguments addObject:object]; \
va_start(args, object); \
while ((arg = va_arg(args, id))) \
[arguments addObject:arg]; \
va_end(args); \
} \
} while(0);
